movie_title: Why laughter is the best medicine - 6 Minute English
introduction: Laughter can be serious business. There’s evidence that people who laugh recover more quickly from i

vocabulary.definition: hormones secreted within the brain and nervous system that reduce pain and stress and induce feelings of pleasure
vocabulary.example: Exercise releases endorphins, which can help improve your mood and reduce feelings of anxiety.

vocabulary.definition: relating to the earliest stages of development or existence; basic and uncomplicated
vocabulary.example: The primitive tools used by early humans were made of stone and wood.

vocabulary.definition: a loud and hearty laugh, often in response to something funny or ridiculous
vocabulary.example: The comedian's joke was so hilarious that the audience erupted into guffaws.

vocabulary.definition: relating to young animals or children who are not fully grown or developed
vocabulary.example: The juvenile elephant playfully splashed around in the water with its trunk.

vocabulary.definition: the scientific study of laughter and its effects on the human body
vocabulary.example: Researchers in gelotology study how laughter impacts physical and mental health.

vocabulary.definition: to laugh quietly or to oneself, often in a subtle or gentle manner
vocabulary.example: She couldn't help but chuckle at the amusing text message she received.
